Post: "Being half the country apart from Eddy means we're never going to make it as a couple and I'll probably end up lonely and unhappy in all my relationships."

Post: "Had to fix bike chain on the way to work and arrived a filthy, bloody mess. This is just typical of my life - one big disaster after another. I'll probably get fired for being late, and then I'll never be able to find a decent job again."
